definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: A great little invention that was made for loads of fun.
sentences.chinese: 一個小發明就會帶來加倍多的歡樂。

sentences.english: We shall work even harder to further honour our pledges.
sentences.chinese: 我們自當加倍努力，進一步落實承諾。

sentences.english: Policy changes led to a doubling of government spending on health.
sentences.chinese: 政策變化導致了政府在衛生方面的開支加倍。

sentences.english: If the cable is urgent, the rate will be doubled.
sentences.chinese: 如果是加急電報，費率加倍。

sentences.english: When I finished sulkins, I double my efforts and worked even harder.
sentences.chinese: 我生完氣，就加倍努力，於是更起勁。

sentences.english: Lazy and inattentive in class. Unsatisfactory results, should work harder.
sentences.chinese: 懶惰及上課不留心，各科成績欠佳，必須加倍努力。

sentences.english: Those plants that determined as haploids were doubled by 2%colchicine.
sentences.chinese: 經鑑定爲單倍體的植株，用2%秋水仙素進行加倍。

sentences.english: But there are always a number of plant-based substitutes, such as soya milk, well prepared for them.
sentences.chinese: 這些人選擇起牛奶和奶製品來可是要加倍小心哦。

sentences.english: The double of 5H invited partner to bid on.
sentences.chinese: 加倍5H是邀請搭檔繼續叫牌。

sentences.english: And we wish to redouble our efforts.
sentences.chinese: 我們還希望爲此加倍努力。

sentences.english: But, this competition is met in promoting, imprint two countries redoubles his efforts.
sentences.chinese: 可是，這場競爭會促成中印兩國加倍盡力。

sentences.english: There is also a doubler feature at no additional cost.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個額外的功能，在沒有成本加倍。

sentences.english: Is double-dose or triple anti-platelet therapy a good idea?
sentences.chinese: 此時劑量加倍或使用三種抗血小板藥物是否合適？

sentences.english: This year the company is on track to again double its hiring of U.S.-born MBAs.
sentences.chinese: 今年公司正準備加倍招收的在美國讀的工商管理碩士。

sentences.english: I love the epic drama twice as much for this reason.
sentences.chinese: 因此我加倍愛念那部詩劇。

sentences.english: The enemy redoubled their screaming on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 敵人在收音機上加倍地狂囂。

definition: to double/to redouble/to increase many times over/to multiply by a factor/multiplication
to be bound to/to be sure to
